website_summaries.verdict: Modest yet modern best describes the latest version of the Adicross Bounce. This shoe offers a relaxed look that fits well for a casual game of golf, yet combines it with technologies needed to achieve lasting comfort, traction, and stability on and off the links.
pros: Not experiencing sore feet from 18 to 19 holes from wearing the Adicross Bounce 2.0 pleases a lot of players
Both first-timers and repeat customers are amazed by the spikeless outsole because it keeps the foot from sliding during a swing
Style-conscious reviewers keep using this model for its eye-catching design that goes well with different outfits
The design of the shoe provides unmatched stability and support, says a couple of purchasers
As they are built with quality materials, several can attest that they are durable
The midsole bounce claim stands true to a small number of commenters
A few can attest that this Adidas golf shoe can withstand the heat and the sun
Given the fantastic features of the shoe, its affordable price tag all makes it worth it
cons: A minority of golfers complain about the material that is attached to the tongue
It is not elastic enough to ease the foot when wearing
One feels disappointed that the top portion of the shoe digs into the foot

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fits true to size I’m not sure what other people are talking about I bought a 12 and a 12 1/2 and I were at 12 and they fit perfectly. The shoes are inexpensive and seem durable. Time will tell how they clean up after walking in the mud and dirt but these are my first pair of spikeless and so far I really like them
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F.

customer_reviews.title: Want to love these shoes but
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these shoes as they fit well however for some reason the design makes the fir too snug around the outside ankle area, about an inch inside from the ankle bone. Its really tight there and causes some discomfort. Why they decided to make that area extra tight, I do not know but if it was not, this shoe was get 5 stars. Im just bearing with it and have not tied my laces too tight to alleviate some of the pressure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vang

customer_reviews.title: Loved this shoes for comfort and waterproof (black leather style)
customer_reviews.text: I have the black leather color because of the price when I bought it, but I really wanted the gray/white color. I am writing this review because I just played while it was raining constantly for 14 holes. My feet were completely dry after. Glad I bought the leather style. Also, I am picky with shoes because I get foot pain when I walk for hours if I am not wearing a proper footwear. Played 5 rounds of golf and so far I didn't get any foot pain. They are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: robber soul

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and they don't slide when swinging. Great to walk in and no sore feet after eighteen holes. Plus you don't have to change shoes to go in the club house.
customer_reviews.author: William Helenihi

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pair of shoes. Very comfortable and fit as expected. Great looking and solid. The soles are great for walking although I was in a cart. Started to rain a little and were a tad slippery, but not bad at all. They are great here in Maui. Very pleased with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Slighter

customer_reviews.title: Bad design for me
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of the shoe and they fit great, I could tell how comfortable the shoes are for the most part EXCEPT for the hard piece that the laces go through that hits right on medial malleolus (ankle bone). If that piece were lower or softer or something these would be great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford M.

customer_reviews.title: Help, I’ve Fallen...
customer_reviews.text: They run larger than anticipated and provide little to no true traction. They’re incredibly comfortable and seem stylish but I can’t over look the traction issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and water proof
customer_reviews.text: I play golf and carry my own bag. They are comfortable after 18 holes and are water proof to morning dew.
customer_reviews.author: Two Tigers

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Good traction with excellent comfort! So far waterproof, at least the white/grey/black shoes. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Comfortable for walking around the GC
customer_reviews.text: Hubby likes these golf shoes the best, he walks a lot & they keep up well & are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Keezer

customer_reviews.title: If you have a high arch don’t buy, and the shoelaces are not centered
customer_reviews.text: The shoelaces are not centered in the shoe, so I wonder if I got a knockoff
customer_reviews.author: GCM

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father for his birthday because his golf shoes were really old. He loves them and wears them when he works in the yard too!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best golf purchase In years!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable golf shoes I’ve ever owned hands down. I’ve had Nike, Ecco, Footjoy and Sketchers and these Adidas are by far the best for walking! Great quality leather that also allow your feet to breath.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Canty

customer_reviews.title: Tough to put on
customer_reviews.text: The inside "shell" is not expandable, thus making the shoes very difficult to put on. Once on they are very comfortable, but the shoe is really hard to initially wear. I returned them for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: glenn gregorcy

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t sit correctly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes unlike other adidas golf shoes just don’t fit me correctly. Something with the top portion makes it feel like they are digging into my leg. I really like the looks of these but as far as comfort these are lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Ariesnc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe so far, grippy and comfortable. I'm typically 10.5 - 11 depending on brand and 10.5 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and good traction. Keep feet dry even playing in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Bounce is Best
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I’ve ever had. I’ve walked 6+ rounds in them and have no complaints. The actual shoe is more stylish than the picture. Flat sole provides firm support and grip on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: Fit is too large. Whole size too large. Normal size is 8.5. 7.5 in this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Gray

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe . Went down half size fit great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have the regular Bounce shoes there is no difference in the feel.. Makes walking the course easier and more enjoyable.. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell rains

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel; comfortable & walk-able. I can carry my golf for the whole 18 rounds for four hours game. They also improved my golf game while teeing off and swinging the ball
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral golf shoe for women too!
customer_reviews.text: As a female golfer, these are a great neutral golf shoe for leggings and a quarter zip. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: elliegirl

customer_reviews.title: Got here super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Haven’t gotten to use them yet but they felt good when I tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: John Qualtrough

customer_reviews.title: First spikeless shoe ever tried and very satisfied of the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Its very comfortable and fit perfectly. Wore it the first time playing and was satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. Most comfortable I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blair Nutting

customer_reviews.title: Surprising design
customer_reviews.text: Their is a huge sharp piece of material that is over stitched and poorly designed that digs into your ankle. Not sure if it’s QC or just a terrible design but either way it’s a massive problem for an otherwise attractive comfortable and affordable cleat. I wouldn’t take the chance of having to send them back but it is possible mine were over stitched or defective. It’s as if whoever designed them never wore their product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are a very comfortable, good looking shoe. I wear quite a few Addias golf shoes and these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoes but did not like the inside/ Tongue is not open it is closed and makes it hard to insert your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Shankar

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow around the ankle. It’s a waste.
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow to allow the foot to slip into the shoe. Poor design. It is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Dapo Adebayo

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes in size 9 and it was true-to-size and a perfect fit. Although not many in my family liked the design very much, I personally LOVE it. I think it's stylish and good-looking. I like the shiny black leather on top and the shiny white part on the back bottom. In terms of comfort, these are excellent. Even after walking several miles today at a local fair festival, my feet felt just fine. For "golf" shoes, these are very good. It isn't as light as my air-filled running shoes but that's because it has leather, a heavier material. All in all, I like these shoes very much for its stylish look and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: optimummind

customer_reviews.title: Too snug on wide feet, nice foot pocket design.
customer_reviews.text: The fit on these is SNUG. I wear a 10.5 or 11, depending on the shoe. In an 11, I have room in the toe, but they are tight in the instep. The shoe inner is a single piece, like a slipper, so it limits the instep adjustment. That combined with the offset laces makes these a snug fit. I do have some occasional foot swelling, so that may have something to do with it. But with typical shoes I can loosen the laces and it's fine. These are limited because of the design. I can see how these would be really comfortable, and the soles are very grippy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. My current golf shoes have small cleats but I play in Arizona and they are not really needed. This is the first pair of shoes I've used without cleats and I haven't experienced any issues. They remain firm on the ground during my swing. These shoes are very comfortable and have a great look to them. I usually like to try shoes on but ordering them online this time worked great. I am happy I tried these and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Small fit
customer_reviews.text: My son wear a size 12. He tried these on an they were too small. They are a nice looking shoe and there are multiple places you can lace them up so you can get a good fit. The problem for my son was his toes were pushed to the very end of the shoe. He said they were squished and he said he needed a larger size. My suggestion, order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking, but not as comfy as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I think these look cool and for a very casual golfer like me who just wants a pair of shoes that I can wear the whole day hanging out with friends, these have a great look. However, after long hours of wear they get uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This are really nice sneakers. Unfortunately I missed the part that said they were men's, so consequently their bigger than I hoped. Other than that, these are a great pair to gift to a son, brother, or significant other.
customer_reviews.author: @Exceptionally_K

customer_reviews.title: It's the little things
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit a little loose. Additionally, they were much heavier than my previous NB Minimus I'd had for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: bs2k45

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adicross Bounce 2 Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Transition to and from the links in these men's golf shoes. Built with a textile upper for enhanced comfort, they feature a sock-like construction and custom lacing system for extra support. Flexible bounce cushioning lets you walk the course and the street in casual comfort.
feature_bullets: Lightweight and supportive forgeframe with an external TPU heel cap on an NMD build
